title: ACE - Ballroom Blitz EP (France-1986) - 80s Geophagus series

cbr 224

ACE - Ballroom Blitz EP (1986) France
New Musidisc Records 11960

[img]http://img507.imageshack.us/img507/2830/acebbau1.jpg[/img]

01. Ballroom Blitz
02. Holding On
03. Eat Me Love Me

May Field - Vocals
Angie - Bass
Paddy - Guitars
Lee Mons - Drums

Ace were a French heavy Rock quartet formed in 1985 in Cannes on the Cote D'Azur.
They debuted the following year with their "Ballroom Blitz" EP, and followed this with the full length "Bad Boys" album.
A further release, the "Holding On" 7" appeared at the years end, but this was to be the end of the road for Ace.
In recent years their "Ballroom Blitz" EP has been mistakenly identified as a NWOBHM release driving it's price up amongst collectors.
All their releases now command a high price tag, a pity for Ace that their records weren't as sought after in their lifetime.
